::DrillBit::

"I wouldn't mind crushing some Maximals, but many of are troops are
still havn't returned from the attack on Hell Beasts base."
He activated his comm.
"DarkFate, Killfest, we have a chance to attack the Maximals with other
Predacons. If we can get the troops together we can do it. What do you
two want to do?"

OOC: I also have to go. I'll check back tomorrow morning before I go to
school. Good night everyone.
